Get Profile Settings

Source: R/shard_map.R
get_profile_settings.Rd

Returns settings based on execution profile.

Usage

get_profile_settings(profile, mem_cap, recycle)

Arguments

profile

Profile name.

mem_cap

User-specified memory cap.

recycle

User-specified recycle setting.

Value

List of settings.

On this page
